properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Okaloosa-Walton County Line to Pensacola FL out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Pensacola FL to Pascagoula MS out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 6 at 11:57AM CST until February 7 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds 25 to 30 kt with gusts
up to 40 kt and seas 6 to 9 ft expected. For the first Small
Craft Advisory, west winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
and seas 6 to 8 ft. For the second Small Craft Advisory,
northwest winds 20 knots and seas 4 to 6 ft expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Pensacola FL to Pascagoula MS out
20 NM and Coastal waters from Okaloosa Walton County Line FL
to Pensacola FL out 20 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 9 AM
CST Friday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 6 PM CST this
evening. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 9 AM to noon CST
Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST FRIDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO NOON CST FRIDAY
